Package de.fraunhofer.iem.secucheck.InternalFluentTQL.catalog.NoSQLInjection.CWE943

Class NoSQLInjectionWithTwoSources

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the No-SQL-Injection with multiple sources in single Taint Flow.

      • sanitizeForMongoDB

        public static java.lang.String sanitizeForMongoDB​(java.lang.String empID)
        This is the simple user defined sanitizer to sanitize the user input for the MongoDB. This is not recommended to use this method as a sanitizer, this is just an example here.
        Parameters:
        empID - Employee ID.
        Returns:
        Sanitized employee id.

      • changeMyPasswordWithoutSafe

        public static java.lang.String changeMyPasswordWithoutSafe()
        This method changes the password requested by the user. this method contains No-SQL-Injection vulnerability.
        Returns:
        password updated or not

      • changeMyPasswordWithSafe

        public static java.lang.String changeMyPasswordWithSafe()
        This method changes the password requested by the user. This method avoids No-SQL-Injection vulnerability.
        Returns:
        password updated or not
